downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 White Paper: Deploying Customizations Across Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 Environments
downloadDescription: This white paper discusses best practices for migrating data during the deployment of Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.

downloadFile.name: Deploying customizations across Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 environments.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/7/9/6/7964c5ad-2a28-4acc-92d5-2bcc72b70c69/Deploying customizations across Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 environments.pdf

detailsSection:
This document provides tips and best practices for developers seeking to deploy Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 between environments. A successful deployment includes the following steps:
  1. Importing metadata
  2. Importing data
  3. Compiling the application
detailsSection_file_name: Deploying customizations across Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 environments.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
